articles.description: Watch live coverage, listen to radio and follow text updates from day three of Wimbledon featuring Emma Raducanu, Carlos Alcaraz and Coco Gauff.

articles.description: Briton Mark Cavendish claims the outright Tour de France stage win record by taking his 35th victory to surpass Eddy Merckx on stage five in Saint Vulbas.
articles.title: Tour de France: Mark Cavendish claims record-breaking 35th stage win

articles.description: England host New Zealand in the third women’s one-day international at Bristol – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs New Zealand LIVE: Third women’s ODI –  cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: The USA men's team is reviewing the home Copa America exit, with several big name managers linked with the job.
articles.title: Could USA get Guardiola or Klopp as manager before 2026 World Cup?

articles.description: Emma Raducanu cruises past Belgium’s Elise Mertens to join fellow Briton Sonay Kartal in the Wimbledon third round.
articles.title: Wimbeldon 2024: Emma Raducanu wins as Sonay Kartal secures third-round meeting with Coco Gauff

articles.description: England striker Ivan Toney admits he was 'annoyed' at being brought on on injury time against Slovakia insists he will 'take my opportunity when I get it'.
articles.title: Ivan Toney: England striker 'annoyed' at lack of Euro 2024 games

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at five reasons to be positive about England's Euro 2024 chances after they reached the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Five reasons to be positive about England's chances

articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Carlos Alcaraz beats Aleksandar Vukic in entertaining display to reach third round

articles.description: Gregor Townsend names five uncapped players in Saturday's line-up to face Canada in the summer tour opener.
articles.title: Rugby union: Five debutants in Scotland XV to face Canada in summer tour opener
